channel.title: Angel Guarisma on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Angel Guarisma on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Changing Security-Enhanced WordPress (SEWP) Modes
item.description: Security-Enhanced WordPress (SEWP) is a security framework for WordPress hosting on Site Bay, designed to provide role-based access control.

item.title: Harnessing Git for Site Bay: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Git is a cornerstone for managing software projects, offering powerful version control capabilities. Whether you’re launching your first WordPress site on Site Bay or managing a complex project, understanding Git is key.

item.title: How to Use Git Sync on Site Bay
item.description: Keeping your Site Bay WordPress site synchronized with your Git repository ensures that updates and changes are seamlessly applied.

item.title: Efficient File Management on Site Bay Hosting with Command Line Tools
item.description: Utilizing tar and gzip commands, you can streamline file management within your Site Bay WordPress hosting environment.
